summary: Teaches the move Thunder Punch, a reliable 75-power Electric-type physical attack with a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
typical_users: Physical attackers needing Electric coverage (e.g., Iron Hands, Rillaboom, Dragonite)
Pokémon with Punching moves benefiting from Iron Fist ability (e.g., Annihilape, Conkeldurr)
Teams requiring paralysis support without sacrificing a moveslot for Thunder Wave
